Articles.Content:
I am really interested in being able to have "floating" parts in the VAB for a pod-racer type craft. With engines that move independently of the module and tug it along.

http://imgur.com/eXtMZ

Any help?

Funny u should ask that i built this earlier today using the gravity cancel mod:

Its not pretty but she flys.

The Gravity cancel mod works to keep it floating but i still need to fix a few of the control issues.

list of mods i have used to make it are :

- http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9618-PLUGIN-PARTS-0-16-Gravity-Canceller-v1-1

Gravity Canceller

- http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/21909-0-16-TouhouTorpedo-s-Modular-Multiwheels-%28Tosh-s-Cart-Mod-powered%29

Modular Mulitwheels

Hope this helps you make ur own
